#nullable enable
using Deepstaging.Effects;
using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace TestApp;
/// <summary>
/// Runtime capability interface for the IGreeter dependency of the Greeter effects module.
/// </summary>
/// <seealso cref="global::TestApp.GreeterModule.Greeter"/>
public interface IHasGreeter
{
    public global::TestApp.IGreeter Greeter { get; }
}

#nullable enable
using Deepstaging.Effects;
using LanguageExt;
using LanguageExt.Effects;
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Diagnostics;
using static LanguageExt.Prelude;

namespace TestApp;
public static partial class GreeterModule
{
    public static partial class Greeter
    {
        private static readonly global::System.Diagnostics.ActivitySource ActivitySource = new("TestApp.Greeter", "1.0.0");
        public static global::LanguageExt.Eff<RT, string> SayHelloAsync<RT>(string name)
            where RT : IHasGreeter => liftEff<RT, string>(async rt => await rt.Greeter.SayHelloAsync(name)).WithActivity("Greeter.SayHelloAsync", ActivitySource);
    }
}

{
    public global::TestApp.INumberProvider NumberProvider { get; }
}

#nullable enable
using Deepstaging.Effects;
using LanguageExt;
using LanguageExt.Effects;
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Diagnostics;
using static LanguageExt.Prelude;

namespace TestApp;
public static partial class GreeterModule
{
    public static partial class NumberProvider
    {
        private static readonly global::System.Diagnostics.ActivitySource ActivitySource = new("TestApp.NumberProvider", "1.0.0");
        public static global::LanguageExt.Eff<RT, int> GetNumberAsync<RT>()
            where RT : IHasNumberProvider => liftEff<RT, int>(async rt => await rt.NumberProvider.GetNumberAsync()).WithActivity("NumberProvider.GetNumberAsync", ActivitySource);
    }
}
